solution_line_template: The following week, he sold {first_week_kg} x {multiplier_next_week} = <<{first_week_kg}*{multiplier_next_week}={second_week_kg}>>{second_week_kg} kg of salmon.
So he sold {first_week_kg} + {second_week_kg} = <<{first_week_kg}+{second_week_kg}={total_kg}>>{total_kg} kg of fish.
